title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 345.4 - Application requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 345.4 - Application requirements

State Regulations
A new written application is required for each year
services are desired. No later than September 30th of each year, for inclusion
in the tax refund offset process during the next succeeding calendar year, an
applicant seeking services under this Part shall provide to the department a
completed application, in the form prescribed by the department, and the
following information and documentation: (a) a certified transcript of a money
judgment for a sum certain for arrears accrued under an order of
support; (b) a sworn statement that
the order of support is no longer subject to appellate judicial review and that
the sum set forth as uncollected on the judgment is accurate; (c) the name and address of the applicant; and
(d) the name, last known
address and social security number of the respondent whose tax refunds are to
be intercepted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
345.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
